text: Monoclonal antibodies have been commonly used in the diagnosis of various diseases . Therapeutics based on monoclonal antibodies have been used successfully in the therapy of various diseases [ 70 , 71 ] . The potential of this approach was acknowledged against coronaviruses during the SARS outbreak [ 72 , 73 ] . And when the other deadly coronavirus attacked humans , this previous knowledge helped greatly in the improving the response against the risk of MERS - CoV .
